item.title: [DELTA] ::combat problem [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

hey guys,

we all know the ::combat command

well, i have a problem

whenever i type ::combat 255 it works, but when i type ::combat 256 or anything higher than that, it makes me lvl 0. Is there anyway to increase the max ::combat lvl?

here is the code for it:

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 1){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

can some1 help me plz!
my base is delta

Read full topic
